text.name: Bow's Glimmer [閃弓]
text.desc:
[CantDuel]
External effects cannot trigger this Skill to be Reused
Deal +24% damage for every [AimForTheGoal] (max 72%)
Deal +24% damage on Critical Hit for every [AimForTheGoal] (max 72%)
- At 4 [AimForTheGoal], instead of the two above effects, deal +444% damage on Critical Hit
[WhenUse] At 4+ [Breath], Base Power +2
[WhenUse] Coin Power +2 for every [AimForTheGoal] (max 4)
[WhenUse] Gain 5 [Breath] for every [AimForTheGoal]
[EndSkill] Lose ([AimForTheGoal] x 5) [Breath]
[EndSkill] Remove [SnipingArrowMode] and [AimForTheGoal] from self

text.name: Bow's Glimmer [閃弓]
text.desc:
[CantDuel]
External effects cannot trigger this Skill to be Reused
Deal +<style="highlight">48% damage for every [AimForTheGoal] (max <style="highlight">144%)
Deal +<style="highlight">48% damage on Critical Hit for every [AimForTheGoal] (max <style="highlight">144%)
- At 4 [AimForTheGoal], instead of the two above effects, deal +444% damage on Critical Hit
[WhenUse] <style="highlight">Base Power +2 for every 4 [Breath] on self (max 10)
[WhenUse] Coin Power +<style="highlight">4 for every [AimForTheGoal] (max <style="highlight">10)
[WhenUse] Gain 5 [Breath] for every [AimForTheGoal]
[EndSkill] Lose (<style="highlight">([AimForTheGoal] - 1) x 5) [Breath]
[EndSkill] Remove [SnipingArrowMode] and [AimForTheGoal] from self

text.name: Unfold Bowblade [弓刀]
text.desc:
<style="highlight">If this unit does not have [ArrowShiFau], activate "Evade" instead

[StartBattle] If this unit is about to use "Bow's Glimmer", use "Evade" instead
[StartBattle] If this unit has [SnipingArrowMode], gain (36 / [AimForTheGoal] Stack) Shield for the turn (once per turn)

[EndBattle] If this unit has [SnipingArrowMode], and did not use an Attack Skill this turn, gain 1 [AimForTheGoal] next turn (once per turn)
[EndBattle] If this unit does not have [SnipingArrowMode], and has 1+ [ArrowShiFau], gain 1 of each [SnipingArrowMode] and [AimForTheGoal] next turn (once per turn)

text.name: Unfold Bowblade [弓刀]
text.desc:
If this unit does not have [ArrowShiFau], activate "Evade" instead

[StartBattle] If this unit is about to use "Bow's Glimmer", use "Evade" instead
[StartBattle] If this unit has [SnipingArrowMode], gain (<style="highlight">60 / [AimForTheGoal] Stack) Shield for the turn (once per turn)

[EndBattle] If this unit has [SnipingArrowMode], and did not use an Attack Skill this turn, gain 1 [AimForTheGoal] next turn (once per turn)
[EndBattle] If this unit does not have [SnipingArrowMode], and has 1+ [ArrowShiFau], gain 1 of each [SnipingArrowMode] and [AimForTheGoal] next turn (once per turn)

1021321.name: Aiming for the Bullseye
1021321.desc: Turn End: apply 1 [PenetrateDamageUp] next turn to the ally who inflicted the most [Laceration] Potency to enemies with its Skills and Passives (includes those from E.G.O Skills; if multiple Identities share the highest [Laceration] inflicted record for the turn, select the Identity earliest in the Deployment order. Does not activate if no one inflicted [Laceration] Potency that turn)

1021301.name: Shi-no-Yumi
1021301.desc:
At 4 [ArrowShiFau] Stack: when this unit gains [Breath] Potency from Base Attack Skill effects, gain +1 [Breath] Count (2 times per Encounter; per-Encounter cap resets when [ArrowShiFau] drops to 3)
If this unit used "Bow's Glimmer" Skill at 2+ [AimForTheGoal], gain 1 [SlashDamageUp] next turn

1021302.name: Snipe - Archery
1021302.desc:
If this unit is in [SnipingArrowMode] state, convert the leftmost Base Attack Skill equipped on the Dashboard to "Bow's Glimmer", then use it at Combat Start
- If, at max [AimForTheGoal] Stack, this unit's Skill 3 is on neither the Dashboard nor the upcoming list of Skills when this effect activates, the Defense Skill equipped on the leftmost Skill Slot counts as a Skill 3, and will be used to activate "Bow's Glimmer"

Gain the following effects based on which Base Attack Skill was converted (Sin Affinity carries over from the converted Skill)
- Skill 1: Base Power +1, deal +11% damage
- Skill 2: Base Power +1, Coin Power +1, deal +22% damage
- Skill 3: Base Power +4, Coin Power +4, deal +44% damage

※ If an E.G.O Skill was equipped at Combat Start, remove [SnipingArrowMode] and this unit does not use "Bow's Glimmer"

1021311.name: Shi-no-Yumi
1021311.desc:
At 4 [ArrowShiFau] Stack: when this unit gains [Breath] Potency from Base Attack Skill effects, gain +1 [Breath] Count (<style="highlight">3</style> times per Encounter; per-Encounter cap resets when [ArrowShiFau] drops to 3)
If this unit used "Bow's Glimmer" Skill at 2+ [AimForTheGoal], gain <style="highlight">2</style> [SlashDamageUp] next turn
